definition: any number of entities considered as a unit, arrange into a group or groups
details:
noun
- any number of entities considered as a unit
= example: any number of entities considered as a unit
= synonyms: grouping
- a set that is closed, associative, has an identity element and every element has an inverse
= synonyms: mathematical group
- (chemistry) two or more atoms bound together as a single unit and forming part of a molecule
= synonyms: radical, chemical group
verb
- arrange into a group or groups
= example: arrange into a group or groups
- form a group or group together
= synonyms: aggroup
